review: I purchased this device knowing very little about streaming media players.  I am happy I choose this product.  It is very easy to setup and use with my many different devices.  I have used this to stream videos from my desktop computer in my upstairs office to my TV downstairs.  I did have to upgrade my wireless router to a N router because I was getting a choppy signal.  I also use my laptop, my iPad, and my iPhone to stream various web videos.  The apps are free and easy to use.  Overall, I'm very happy with this device as my first streaming media player.

review: Doesn't work with att uverse.  I bought a chromecast device 5 months ago and was excited about it.  It seemed like an easy setup,  just plug in and go but that's not the case with u verse. They use a 2 wire router that's incompatible with cromecast unless you change certain settings. According to customer service at uverse making those changes would compromise my security.  Both cromecast and uverse referred me to pace America who make the 2 wire device but they weren't helpful. Shame on you amazon and cromecast for not making this compatibility issue easier to check before buying. What a waste of $35. I'd give it no stars if that was possible.
author: Vicki Merkel

review: I received my Chromecast player and was able to quickly install it on my android phone and tablet and PC laptop. I learned a few things.1.  Older Vista and Win7 computers may not stream via Chrome tab well, especially if the processor isn't a quadcore or i5 processor. (mine was horrible)2.  Amazon Prime instant video doesn't stream via Android with chromecast, (requires kindle or ios)3. A lot of app downloads my be required.  There are apps available for Crackle and Viewster that gives free tv for casting.  Youtube works ok too.4. Must have hulu plus and app to cast via Android.5. Must have netflix app to cast via Android.All and all it's a cool piece of hardware and basically does what it says it will... However is it worth the cash?  I'm still undecided about that.**edit**  Today is exactly 4 days since I got this product.I HATE it... if I could give it Zero stars I would.Despite the previous information, I tried to like this thing.  But the ONLY thing it streamed well was Youtube.  Crackle and Viewster both had buffering,stuttering and flat refuses to play. I never did get Netflix to work right either. Then today after streaming 1 (one) show, it suddenly wanted me to set it up again.  So I tried.... and tried...and tried.  I unplugged, reset, re-booted wifi, chromecast and my tablet and phone...and the dang thing refused to connect to the wifi and complete the set up.  I don't know if they updated something or what but after today I'm returning this utter and complete hunk of garbage. Google btw... is NOT helpful.Take my advice.  DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
